languages.text: "Похоже, развлечение приготовили для меня. Ума не приложу, где мои подданные нашли столь экзотическую тварь — да еще и разговаривающую!"
"It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
languages.original_text: "Похоже, развлечение приготовили для меня. Ума не приложу, где мои подданные нашли столь экзотическую тварь — да еще и разговаривающую!"

traits.locale_text: "It looks like it is I who is going to be entertained. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
"It looks like it is I who is going to be entertained. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
"It looks like it is I who is going to be entertained. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
"It looks like it is I who is going to be entertained. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
"It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"
"It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

languages.text: 「もてなされているのはこちらの方か。我が従者達はこんな奇天烈な獣をどこから見つけてくるのやら、ちっとも見当がつかない…おまけに喋れるなんて！」
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: 「もてなされているのはこちらの方か。我が従者達はこんな奇天烈な獣をどこから見つけてくるのやら、ちっとも見当がつかない…おまけに喋れるなんて！」

languages.text: “看起来，受到款待的人应该是我才对。我简直想象不到，我的臣民究竟是从哪里找到了这么奇妙的畜生，这只畜生居然还会说话！”
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: “看起来，受到款待的人应该是我才对。我简直想象不到，我的臣民究竟是从哪里找到了这么奇妙的畜生，这只畜生居然还会说话！”

languages.text: « Oh, mais on dirait plutôt que c'est à moi qu'on a fait un cadeau. Je me demande où mes sujets ont bien pu trouver une créature aussi exotique. Et qui parle, en plus ! »
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mais on dirait plutôt que c'est à moi qu'on a fait un cadeau. Je me demande où mes sujets ont bien pu trouver une créature aussi exotique. Et qui parle, en plus ! »

languages.text: «Parece que soy yo quien va a recibir una grata sorpresa. No puedo ni imaginar de dónde han sacado mis súbditos una bestia tan exótica. ¡Y además, habla!».
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: «Parece que soy yo quien va a recibir una grata sorpresa. No puedo ni imaginar de dónde han sacado mis súbditos una bestia tan exótica. ¡Y además, habla!».

languages.text: "Offenbar bin ich es, {mf|der|die} einen Leckerbissen bekommt. Wo haben meine Untertanen nur ein solch exotisches Geschöpf gefunden — und es kann sogar sprechen!"
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: "Offenbar bin ich es, die einen Leckerbissen bekommt. Wo haben meine Untertanen nur ein solch exotisches Geschöpf gefunden — und es kann sogar sprechen!"

languages.text: "Görünüşe göre bana eğlence çıktı. Tebaamın böyle egzotik, üstüne üstlük konuşabilen bir yaratığı nereden bulduğunu hiç bilmiyorum!"
languages.original_text: "It seems it is I who is in for a treat. I cannot even begin to fathom where my subjects found such an exotic beast — and a talking one at that!"

traits.locale_text: "Görünüşe göre bana eğlence çıktı. Tebaamın böyle egzotik, üstüne üstlük konuşabilen bir yaratığı nereden bulduğunu hiç bilmiyorum!"
